issue.title: gigazine.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://gigazine.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgigazine.net%2F) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qkqyh61lxus0w00gwsss4co8g000s4smoaqr0klx9c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.18.0.2089 release System version: | `バージョン26.2（ビルド25C56）` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block third-party Authorization header

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `quic://dns.adguard-dns.com`
filters: `AdGuard DNS filter`, `DnsUserRules` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.18.0.2089+release&system_version=%E3%83%90%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B8%E3%83%A7%E3%83%B326.2%EF%BC%88%E3%83%93%E3%83%AB%E3%83%8925C56%EF%BC%89&browser=safari&filters=2.3.4.7.11.17.18.19.20.21.22.208&dns_servers=quic%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520filter%252C%250ADnsUserRules&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.referrer=&stealth.user_agent=&stealth.ip=208.54.104.184&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=true&stealth.block_trackers=true&referrer=&scheme_version=3&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=2000)
